adopt.from sentence: Specifically , observing that in the SQuAD dataset many questions are paraphrases of sentences from the original text , we adopt a match - LSTM model that we developed earlier for textual entailment .

We further adopt the Pointer Net ( Ptr - Net ) model developed by , which enables the predictions of tokens from the input sequence only rather than from a larger fixed vocabulary and thus allows us to generate answers that consist of multiple tokens from the original text .

name: sequence model
boundary model
two ways.from sentence: We propose two ways to apply the Ptr - Net model for our task : a sequence model and a boundary model .

boundary model.from sentence: We also further extend the boundary model with a search mechanism .
